examples.korean: Exposure to the sun can accelerate the ageing process. 발음듣기 햇볕에 노출되면 노화 진행이 가속화될 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Exposure to the sun can accelerate the ageing process. 발음

examples.korean: Inflation continues to accelerate. 발음듣기 인플레이션이 계속 가속화되고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
an acceleration in the rate of economic growth 발음듣기 가속되는 경제 성장률 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: an acceleration in the rate of economic growth 발음

examples.korean: Migration for work is accelerating in the Third World. 발음듣기 제3세계에서 직업을 구하기 위한 이주가 가속되고 있다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: Migration for work is accelerating in the Third World. 발음

examples.korean: The shift from their traditional telecom business has been accelerating as the three companies have suffered performance deterioration of their mobile phone business over the past year. 발음듣기 전통적인 통신 사업으로부터의 변화는 지난해 세 통신사가 모바일 통신 사업의 수익 저하를 겪으며 가속화되어왔다. The Korea Times
examples.english: The shift from their traditional telecom business has been accelerating as the three companies have suffered performance deterioration of their mobile phone business over the past year. 발음
